lead_paragraph: A 5-1 loss to Royals ushered the Twins from contention and a date with the Yankees in the American League wild-card game.

headline.main: A Loss Ensures the Twins’ Season, a Pleasant Surprise, Will End in Disappointment
headline.print_headline: Loss Ensures That Twins’ Season, a Pleasant Surprise, Will End in Disappointment

snippet: A 5-1 loss to Royals ushered the Twins from contention and a date with the Yankees in the American League wild-card game.
